name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE 4.1 The Shadow of New Despair
notes:
Text is not 100% working but should be easy to figure out whats what just fine.
If you have Use GLSL disabled in runner options, Will stutter alot
content:
game:
  appid: 410320
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2013
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2015
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: corefonts cjkfonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
  pulse_latency: true
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
